_sText:
This map is another linear map made by Jakeâ„¢ #usa (me)
If you fall, you're going back to the start. (take your time)

- The zone underlined in green is the Start Zone
- The Red room in the middle of the map is the End Zone
- The Turquoise represent the Bonus, the illusionary !b is the beginning platform.

No multi-triggers, the fastest bhopper wins the race.
Enjoy and remember to Auto on ;)

**UPDATED**: 9/28/3:06 PM CST
